de.thkoeln.cvogt.android.propanim_utilities

Class DependentBorderCV

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.thkoeln.cvogt.android.propanim_utilities.DependentGuiObjectCV
      • de.thkoeln.cvogt.android.propanim_utilities.DependentBorderCV

  • public class DependentBorderCV
extends DependentGuiObjectCV
    This class is used to specify borders that shall be drawn around object of class AnimatedGuiObjectCV. Works currently only for circles, squares, and rectangles that do not rotate.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DependentBorderCV(AnimatedGuiObjectCV guiobj, int borderwidth, int color)
      Constructor to initialize the attributes and to register the newly created object with the associated AnimatedGuiObjectCV object

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void deregister()
      Method to deregister the object from guiobj.
      void draw(android.graphics.Canvas canvas)
      Method to draw a border around guiobj.
      void onDeregisteredFromGuiObject(AnimatedGuiObjectCV guiobj)
      Method called from the removeDependentGuiObject() of the AnimatedGuiObjectCV where this object was registered.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • DependentBorderCV

        public DependentBorderCV(AnimatedGuiObjectCV guiobj,
                         int borderwidth,
                         int color)
        Constructor to initialize the attributes and to register the newly created object with the associated AnimatedGuiObjectCV object

    • Method Detail

      • draw

        public void draw(android.graphics.Canvas canvas)
        Method to draw a border around guiobj. This method will be called automatically by the draw() methods of all AnimatedGuiObjectsCV where this object is registered.
        Currently, only borders around objects of type TYPE_DRAWABLE_CIRCLE, TYPE_DRAWABLE_SQUARE or TYPE_DRAWABLE_RECT will be drawn.
        Specified by:
        draw in class DependentGuiObjectCV
        Parameters:
        canvas - Canvas to draw on

      • deregister

        public void deregister()
        Method to deregister the object from guiobj.
        Specified by:
        deregister in class DependentGuiObjectCV

      • onDeregisteredFromGuiObject

        public void onDeregisteredFromGuiObject(AnimatedGuiObjectCV guiobj)
        Method called from the removeDependentGuiObject() of the AnimatedGuiObjectCV where this object was registered. Will do nothing because there is no other object of class AnimatedGuiObjectCV involved.
        Specified by:
        onDeregisteredFromGuiObject in class DependentGuiObjectCV
        Parameters:
        guiobj - The object from where this method is called.
